name: Criosphinx
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Inscrutable
text: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
text: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The sphinx makes a ram attack and two claw attacks.

action.name: Ram
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (3d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

The monstrosity can take 2 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The monstrosity regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Ram Attack
text: The sphinx makes one ram attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
text: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
